original: 'dul ba yang yin la chen po yin pas na 'dul ba che'o //
analyzed: 'dul ba yang yin la chen po yin pas na 'dul ba che'o //
translated: The term great trainer is used because he is both a trainer and great.

original: sems can 'dul bar byed pas na tham cad du khyab pa yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sems can 'dul bar byed pas na tham cad du khyab pa yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The term pervading all is used because he is the trainer of sentient beings and thus is all-pervading.

original: khyab pa po zhes bya ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir khyab bdag go //
analyzed: khyab pa po zhes bya ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir khyab bdag go //
translated: The term all-pervading lord is used because he is the self of all things, both moving and unmoving.

original: 'gro don zhes bya ba ni drang ba'i don du gsungs pas na 'gro don no //
analyzed: 'gro don zhes bya ba ni drang ba'i don du gsungs pas na 'gro don no //
translated: The benefit of beings is the benefit of beings, because it is taught in the interpretable meaning.

original: 'dul byed du nges pa de rnams la mchog tu gyur pas na 'dul mchog go //
analyzed: 'dul byed du nges pa de rnams la mchog tu gyur pas na 'dul mchog go //
translated: The supreme discipline is the supreme discipline among those who are certain to be disciplined.

original: brgyad chos dbyings zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs pa'i sems ni chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: brgyad chos dbyings zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs pa'i sems ni chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the mind that abandons apprehended objects and apprehending subjects, which is the realm of phenomena.

original: mnyam brnyes zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mnyam brnyes zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa ste /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum ste /
translated: The TathƒÅgatas are the direct perception.

original: byed pa ni mnyam par brnyes pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa ni mnyam par brnyes pa'o //
translated: The attainment is the attainment of equality.

original: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin nyid chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin nyid chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the realm of phenomena that is the nature of the TathƒÅgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: The TathƒÅgatas are the realization of the suchness of all phenomena, which is the TathƒÅgata.

original: rdo rje mgon po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de dag gi bdag gi bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mgon po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de dag gi bdag gi bde ba chen po'o //
translated: The vajra lord is the great bliss of those such as Vajrasattva.

original: chen po yang yin la mgon po yang @303b yin pas na mgon po chen po ste /
analyzed: chen po yang yin la mgon po yang @303b yin pas na mgon po chen po ste /
translated: He is the Great Protector because he is great and a protector.

original: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The great Dharmadhatu is the nature of the Great Illuminator.

original: sems can tshogs zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems can gyi gzugs su bzung nas bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can tshogs zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems can gyi gzugs su bzung nas bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //

original: 'od chen po 'di la mnga' bas na 'od chen te /
analyzed: 'od chen po 'di la mnga' bas na 'od chen te /
translated: He is the Great Light because he possesses this great light.

original: nam mkha' thams cad 'od kyis khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' thams cad 'od kyis khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The entire sky is pervaded by light.

original: snang ba che zhes bya ba ni snang ba chen po 'di la mnga' bas na snang ba che ste /
analyzed: snang ba che zhes bya ba ni snang ba chen po 'di la mnga' bas na snang ba che ste /
translated: He is the Great Illumination because he possesses this great illumination.

original: rdo rje nyi ma ye shes kyi nyi ma'i snang bas phyi nang gi mun pa dang bcas pa gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma ye shes kyi nyi ma'i snang bas phyi nang gi mun pa dang bcas pa gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The illumination of the vajra sun and the sun of intuition clears away the darkness of the outer and inner world.

original: brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus chen po 'di la mnga' bas na brtson 'grus chen po ste /
analyzed: brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus chen po 'di la mnga' bas na brtson 'grus chen po ste /

analyzed: byang chub chen po yongs su sbyong ba'i brtson 'grus de thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that effort which is the purification of great enlightenment pervades all.

original: stobs che zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i chen po 'di la mnga' bas na stobs chen po'o //
analyzed: stobs che zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i chen po 'di la mnga' bas na stobs chen po'o //

original: dpa' chen po ni yin pas na dpa' chen po ste /
analyzed: dpa' chen po ni yin pas na dpa' chen po ste /
translated: He is a great hero because he is a hero.

original: so sor rtog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs bdud bzhi las rgyal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs bdud bzhi las rgyal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: He is a great hero because he is a hero, because he has the nature of the vajra-yaksa form of the effort of discernment, and because he is victorious over the four demons.

analyzed: rab dpa' mchog ces bya ba ni shin tu dpa' bas na rab tu dpa' ba ste / de dag gi rab dga' mchog go //

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sku nan tan du byed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin rdo rje khu tshur gzugs kyi khams na spyod pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa rtsad nas 'don pa'i phyir bde spyod ces bya ba la /

translated: He is the supreme hero because he is the best of the heroes, because he has the nature of the vajra-fist effort of the performance of the body which is naturally radiant, and because he completely eradicates the afflictions along with their instincts which are active in the form realm.üîΩHe is the supreme hero because he is the best of the heroes, because he has the nature of the vajra-fist effort of the performance of the body which is naturally radiant, and because he completely eradicates the afflictions along with their instincts which are active in the form realm.

original: bde ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde chen po'o //
analyzed: bde ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde chen po'o //

original: de'i bdag nyid du myong zhing spyod pas na bde spyod de //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid du myong zhing spyod pas na bde spyod de //
translated: Since he experiences and enjoys that as his very essence, he is the enjoyer of bliss.

original: dpa' ba khyed ces bya ba ni dpa' ba gzi brjid can te /
analyzed: dpa' ba khyed ces bya ba ni dpa' ba gzi brjid can te /
translated: The one who is heroic is the one who is heroic, the one who is powerful.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma rgyal pos thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma rgyal pos thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One, the King Vajras≈´rya, is the one who overwhelms all.

analyzed: tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni tshangs pas 'dul ba rnams la de'i gzugs ston pa'i phyir ro //

original: rang byung zhes bya ba ni slob dpon med par thams cad mkhyen pas mkhyen zhing rtogs pa'i phyir bsod nams ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod la /

translated: The self-arisen one is the Blessed One, who is called the Blessed One because he possesses the accumulations of merit and wisdom, knowing and realizing all things by himself without a teacher.

analyzed: de 'di la mnga' bas na bcom ldan 'das so //

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi chos so //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi chos so //
translated: He is the one who has the Dharma of irreversible diligence.

analyzed: kun bdag che zhes bya ba ni dngos po thams cad kyi chos kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir kun bdag go //

original: chos rgyal lo //
analyzed: chos rgyal lo //

original: sku'i mchog ces bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo'i sku la mchog tu gyur pas na sku gsum zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang ; sprul pa dang / chos kyi sku dang ldan pa'i phyir sku gsum mo //

translated: The supreme body is the supreme body of reality, because it is the essence of thusness. The three bodies are the body of reality, the beatific body, and the emanation body, because it possesses the three bodies.

original: sku min bsgom pa'i zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i sku gsum chos bdag med pa'i lam gyis bsgoms pas snang ba med pa'i phyir na sku min bsgoms pa'o //

original: kun gyi sku zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid du rnam par smin pa dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku'i gzugs kyi sku yin pa'i phyir kun gyi sku'o //

analyzed: sku che ba zhes bya ba ni skus nam mkha' khyab pas na sku che'o //

original: rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //

analyzed: dbang bskur bzang po zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba bzang po 'di la mnga' bas na dbang bskur bzang po'o //

original: rnam rgyan khyod ces bya ba ni rin po che'i cod pan la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis sems can thams cad rnam par brgyan par byed pa'i phyir na rnam brgyan de mtshan bdun @312a * //

translated: The great Bodhisattva is the body of Vajra≈õrƒ´.

analyzed: rdo rje bzhad pa zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //

analyzed: bzhad pa che zhes bya ba ni spro pa dang bsdu pa'i sgo nas so // dgyes pa che zhes bya ba ni yid bde ba dpag tu med pa'i rgyur gyur pas na dgyes pa che'o //

analyzed: rab dgyes che zhes bya ba ni yid bde ba skyed par byed pas rab dgyes ma'o //

analyzed: dgyes pa'i shugs zhes bya ba ni rtog pa med pa dga' ba'i rgyun @312b 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir dgyes pa'i shugs so //

analyzed: rol zhing dgyes zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems la dga' zhing mgu bas na rol zhing dgyes so //

original: rdo rje chos zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje chos zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //

original: chos che ba zhes bya ba ni spro pa dang bsdu pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: chos che ba zhes bya ba ni spro pa dang bsdu pa'i sgo nas so //

analyzed: thams cad chos zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir thams cad chos so //

original: rab sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis sems can gyi khams shin tu sbyong pas na spyong ba'o //

original: sangs rgyas chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams chos te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams chos te /

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bos so //
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bos so //
translated: All dharmas are the essence of the Tathagata's samadhi, which is pure by nature.

original: chos rab mchog ces bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad las phul du byung pa yin pas na chos rab mchog go //

original: rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //

analyzed: ral gri zhes bya ba ni spro pa dang bsdu pa'i sgo nas so //

translated: The wisdom exalted wisdom means that because it is the essence of ascertaining all dharmas as selfless, it is the wisdom exalted wisdom.

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshon cha yin pas na sangs rgyas mtshon cha ste mtshan bdun yin no //

original: rdo rje rgyu zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyu zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //

analyzed: gter chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bos zad mi shes pa'i phyir na gter chen po'o //

translated: The wheel of Dharma is the wheel of Dharma because it causes the retention of the ma·πá·∏çala of Vajrasattva and so forth to be transferred into the mind-stream of the disciples.

analyzed: rdo rje gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //

analyzed: gsung ba che zhes bya ba ni spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sgo nas so //

original: mtshan bdun yin no //
analyzed: mtshan bdun yin no //

analyzed: rdo rje las zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //

analyzed: las rab mchog ces bya ba ni dge ba rnams kyi las yin @313b pas na rab ste /
